snippet: The Fresh Air Fund camping program gave one Bronx boy the outdoor activities he couldn’t find in his neighborhood park. Readers can help others like him this summer.
abstract: Editorial notes that Fresh Air Fund camping program, which places New York City children with families and in summer camps in greener areas across 13 states and Canada, hopes to help 9,000 children in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Fresh Air Fund camping program gave one Bronx boy the outdoor activities he couldn’t find in his neighborhood park. Readers can help others like him this summer.

headline.main: Finding Open Space and Fresh Air
headline.print_headline: Finding Open Space and Fresh Air
